entry.title: 5 PCS | 7"x106" Silver Pintuck Chair Sash
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2140
Type: Chair Sashes
Price: 6.19

[About]

Quantity: 5 Chair Sashes
Material: Taffeta Pintuck w/ Metallic Shine finish.
Color: Silver
Size: 7" wide x 106" long. Each Square: 3"x3"
Edges are serged to form an elegant look when tied into bow form.
﻿All sizes are approximate measurements.
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.
Purchase Sash Buckles
Purchase Chiavari Chairs
Purchase Pintuck Runner
Purchase Pintuck Napkins
Purchase Pintuck Overlays
Purchase Pintuck Round Tablecloths
Purchase Pintuck Rectangle Tablecloths

[Information]

Pintuck is actually a fold of fabric that is stitched intricately to hold it in a place, very much like a pleat. These lovely pleats impart a decorative effect to the fabric by fashioning a visual line at a chosen point. They effortlessly bridge vintage and contemporary styles to create a majestic new classic look. If you do not want your celebration to blend in with other weddings, birthdays, and anniversaries, try our premium quality pintuck sashes that contain everything you need to lend your event the look and aura that it deserves. Celebrate your special day with our splendid square pintuck style chair sashes wrapped elegantly around your plain and ordinary chair covers. Be the show stopper by designing some awesome bows and other accents with pintuck patterns and style. Create an inviting ambiance for your guests by throwing a pintuck theme ambiance containing squared pattern napkins, overlays, runners, and linens.

 

Additional Information:

  • Each order is for 5 sashes. Sashes are shipped untied.
  • How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
  • For sashes only, does not include any other decorations
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration
